content.text:
# 2016 Seattle Film Critics Society Awards

The 1st Seattle Film Critics Society Awards were announced on January 5, 2017.
The nominations were announced on December 21, 2016.
Winners and nominees
, Best Director winner and Best Screenplay co-winner]]
, Best Actor in a Leading Role winner]]
, Best Actress in a Leading Role winner]]
, Best Actor in a Supporting Role winner]]
, Best Actress in a Supporting Role winner]]
, Best Screenplay co-winner]]
, Best Animated Feature co-winner]]
, Best Animated Feature co-winner]]
, Best Documentary Feature winner]]
, Best Foreign Language Film winner]]
, Best Cinematography winner]]
, Best Original Score winner]]
, Best Youth Performance winner]]
, Best Villain winner]]
